og.title: Cihan Deniz
og.description: Throughout my career, I've experienced various aspects of building software and I believe every one of them is as important as the others.

children.value:
Throughout my career, I've experienced various aspects of building software and
I believe every one of them is as important as the others. I raise awareness of
these aspects so my customers know where their resources are actually used.
How to make good engineering habits that are unique to the company itself
How to understand and adopt programming skills that are accepted worldwide
How to create short and meaningful increments of software
How to design a quality software that works
How to build a solid team culture that sustains for years

How to keep total cost of ownership low to deliver even years after the first
increment

I love to think about these topics, to try and learn while delivering working
software.
